a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global allocation of crops to end uses by farm size, 2010
Allocation of crops – measured as the aggregate across all major food groups in kilocalories – broken down by farm
size. Farms are grouped based on their total agricultural area, in hectares.
Data source: Ricciardi et al. (2018), How much of the world's food do smallholders produce?. Global Food Security.
